title: Sweet Baby Co. Sage Green Balloon Garland Arch Kit with Eucalyptus Olive, Peach, White, Gold Balloons and Greenery for Forest Safari Jungle Tropical Theme Decorations Baby Bridal Shower Birthday Party
features: ALL-IN-ONE ARCH KIT INCLUDES: 127 18 inch, 10 inch, 5 inch balloons in light and dark sage green, white, gold chrome, peachy nude, with 12 inch gold confetti balloons, 8 stems of artificial dark green leaves, garland tape, balloon tie tool, glue dots, string

NEUTRAL AND CHIC: Add an oh so trendy glam balloon arch to the party decor or baby nursery. You get 141 pieces of versatile party supplies for either wall or table for a bridal shower, gender reveal, hunter theme birthday, dinosaur or lion king themed parties, animal theme celebrations backdrop, dark mint decor, wild one or wild things decoration, woodland arrangements, backyard wedding

ASSEMBLY REQUIRED? YES: Instructions are included. Balloons ship flat and will require inflation and assembly. Eucalyptus stems will need fluffing. Assembly for this beautiful earthy tone decor can take anywhere from an hour to three hours. Please plan ahead. For maximum ease, we recommend an electric or hand air pump (not included) to inflate the balloons

NO HELIUM NECESSARY: No trip to the store needed! Our bundle includes directions and the supplies you will need to create a beautiful celebration table, for boy or girl, right at home! We include plenty of garland tape (16 feet!) and glue dots for the balloon arch, and enough floral greenery leaves for both garland AND table decor

MATERIALS TESTED IN THE USA: Sweet Baby Company is a self-financed, woman owned company. All Sweet Baby Co. products are professionally designed and tested with love. Your set comes with 141 pieces, all carefully packaged. As soon as your decorations arrive, check it and tell us if anything is missing so we can replace it fast before your event. There is no risk when purchasing this PREMIUM QUALITY sage balloon garland kit
description: Sweet Baby Company kits help you create an amazing, fun centerpiece and make your special parties unforgettable!

What you see is what you get! You will receive a full supply with our products: 3 sizes of balloons for balloon arch, greenery leaves, and must have garland accessories. All you need is an air pump. Easily create full backdrops for a celebration, indoors or outdoors.
Sweet Baby Co. Sage Garland and Greenery Package includes: ASSORTED LATEX BALLOONS

4x 18" jumbo in dark sage green, white 8x 12" gold confetti clear balloons95x 10" medium in light sage, dark sage, peach, matte and pearl white and gold metallic (Please note that light sage and dark sage balloons will look similar before inflation) 20x 5" small in white and gold metallic
**It is NOT recommended to fill with helium if making a garland** LEAFY FOLIAGE ACCESSORIES
8x 10" faux stems (can be for the garland or as table decor)
16' balloon strip garland tape 100 glue dots 1 balloon tie tool 1 roll of string
**We would highly recommend an air pump, hand or electric, as air is NOT INCLUDED**
* Paper instructions are included for assembling balloon garlands * No craft experience necessary
All decor you see in the photos are made by Sweet Baby Co., exactly the same you get when you order!

Perfect Pack for: Glam BabyShower Centerpieces, Gender Reveal Back Drop for Boys or Girls, Pregnancy Announcement, Bridal Shower, Wedding, First Birthday Party, 2 Happy Birthday, Welcome Home Event, Plant (Botanical, Emerald, Eucalyptus, Succulent, Monstera, Forest, Swamp), Noah Ark, Monkey or Tarzan Themed Photoshoots, Floral Leaf Bridal Photography or Teal Table Background, Boho Animals Rainforest Jungle Zoo for Boy, Bachelorette, Decoracion Para Fiesta de Nino, Guirnalda de Globos Verdes, Christmas, Graduation
